\chapter{Creating Vectors}
\label{cheatsheet:the-quantecon-matlab-python-julia-cheat-sheet}\label{cheatsheet:creating-vectors}
\begin{tabular}{|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|}
\hline
\textsf{\relax 
Operation
} & \textsf{\relax 
MATLAB
} & \textsf{\relax 
Python
} & \textsf{\relax 
Julia
}\\
\hline
Create a row vector
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2} \PYG{l+m+mi}{3}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{np}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{array}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2} \PYG{l+m+mi}{3}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2} \PYG{l+m+mi}{3}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
\\
\hline
Create a column vector
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{;} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{;} \PYG{l+m+mi}{3}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{;} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{;} \PYG{l+m+mi}{3}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
\\
\hline
Sequence starting at j
ending at n, with
difference k between points
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{n+nb}{j}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{n}{k}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{n}{n}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{j}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{n}{k}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{n}{n}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
\\
\hline
Linearly spaced vector
of k points
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{n+nb}{linspace}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+m+mi}{5}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{k}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{linspace}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+m+mi}{5}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{k}\PYG{p}{)}

\chapter{Manipulating Vectors and Matrices}
\label{cheatsheet:manipulating-vectors-and-matrices}
\begin{tabular}{|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|p{0.237\linewidth}|}
\hline
\textsf{\relax 
Operation
} & \textsf{\relax 
MATLAB
} & \textsf{\relax 
Python
} & \textsf{\relax 
Julia
}\\
\hline
Transpose
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A}\PYG{o}{\PYGZsq{}}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A}\PYG{o}{\PYGZsq{}}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
\\
\hline
Concatenate horizontally
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}

or

\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{p}{=} \PYG{n}{horzcat}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}

\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{OriginalVerbatim}
 & 
\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{A} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+m+mi}{1} \PYG{l+m+mi}{2}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{OriginalVerbatim}

or

\begin{OriginalVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
